page.title: 10Home Life
page.content: {A Day In The Life Of {Myself } I go to school at Weobley Comprehensive.I am 12 years old and I am in the first year,of this school.Our school day is divided into seven 40 minute lessons and a fifteen minute break and 1 hour 20 minutes for dinner. {Monday Timetable } Arithmetic,Maths,Music,R.K.,Maths, French,English. I enjoy school and I'm sure they're the best years of our lives. In Arithmetic we have Mr.Price and do lots of maths,after this lesson we do maths where we do harder work than arithmetic! In Music we have Mrs.White and in this lesson we sing.In Religious Knowledge we are on the New Testament.
